name: FIGHT THE HORDE
description:
FIGHT THE HORDE is a halloween-themed topdown shooter made in three days for Crzy's Halloween Game Jam.

Play as little Timmy and use your trusty nerf gun do some zombie slaying and property damaging. Take as many candies as you can from your neighbors before curfew, and use their unorthodox sugar molecules to temporarily boost your abilities to superhuman levels. Timmy's life, and the lives of his family, are in your hands.

All sound effects were found on freesound.org. Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Chase Pulse Faster" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
